remarks: Distribution of class substitution over union of two classes, inference version.  (Contributed by Drahflow, 23-Sep-2015.)  Obsolete as of 13-Sep-2018.  Use ~ csbun instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
